alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 6:36AM MST until January 09 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 2 to 5 inches in the valleys except up to 1 inch in Kamiah. On the Camas Prairie total snow accumulation 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph in higher terrain Tuesday. * WHERE...Craigmont, Winchester, Kamiah, Nezperce, and Soldiers Meadow Road. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact travel Tuesday. Strong winds could cause localized damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
